Module edu.uoc.uocanoid
Package edu.uoc.uocanoid.model.bricks

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
edu.uoc.uocanoid.model.Entity
edu.uoc.uocanoid.model.bricks.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrickAdvanced, BrickBasic, BrickUnbreakable
public abstract class Brick extends Entity
Brick class.
Author:
David García Solórzano

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    currentHits
    Number of hits that the brick has received so far.
    private int
    numHitsToBreak
    Number of hits that the brick must receive in order to be broken.
    private int
    points
    Points that the player earns when s/he breaks the brick.

      width - Value for width.

      points - Value for points.

      private void setCurrentHits(int currentHits)
      Setter of the attribute currentHits.
      If the new value is less than 0, then the value to be assigned must be 0.
      Parameters:
      currentHits - New value to assign to the attribute currentHits.

    • incCurrentHits

      public void incCurrentHits()
      If the brick is not broken, then this method increases 1 unit the value of the attribute currentHits. Otherwise, the current value remains.

    • isBroken

      public boolean isBroken()
      It indicates if the brick is broken or not.
      Returns:
      {code true} if the brick has received as many hits as are necessary to break it. Otherwise, false.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Getter of the attribute points.
      Returns:
      Current value of the attribute points.

    • setPoints

      private void setPoints(int points)
      Setter of the attribute points.
      If the new value is less than 0, then the value to be assigned must be 0.
      Parameters:
      points - New value to assign to the attribute points.

      public String toString()
      Format: "position: (x,y), size: widthxheight, hits to break: numHitsToBreak, current hits: currentHits, points: points"
